div.div: Stress hormones in Astrochelys yniphora populations.
div.p: Summary of mean circulating corticosterone concentrations in male (M), female (F), and sub-adult (SA) A. yniphora from the wild, a captive population near native range (Madagascar Captive), and a small outgroup, captive population in the U.S from 2013â€“2015. Error bars = 1SE.
